categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: A battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, was fought in 3996 BBY. At the Taanab system, the two sides fought with the Sith emerging as the victors.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. It illustrated the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
